coding.name: COADING
coding.reason: This is my dream job, This is what i really want to achieve!
coding.description: I always think to this dream that if I can be a successful web developer one day and be able to elevate my job and be a ral pro in ths field. I love the challenges, the nature and every thing in this field. Now it is very hard for me to do it but I know I will do it!

iceSkating.name: ICE SKATING
iceSkating.reason: I love the freedom and the way I float in ice skating!
iceSkating.description: Wow! no word can descripe it's feeling! It is one of the bests in the World. Being free and light and floating to every dirction you want is great great great and GREAT!

painting.name: PAINTING
painting.reason: It guide me to a new world! a world with no impossible in it!
painting.description: Painting gives me the ability to feel as an almighty! I can go where ever I want in my paintings, to past or future or even in other's minds. This is absolute freedom.
